alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, or near Pembroke Pines, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Lauderdale, Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Hallandale, Miami Gardens, Lauderhill, Weston, North Miami, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Lauderdale Lakes, Dania Beach, Miami Lakes, Cooper City, Sunny Isles Beach and Opa-Locka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
